snippet.title: Night Slashers: Remake || Date Annoucement Trailer
snippet.description:
Night Slashers: Remake – The Ultimate Horror Beat 'Em Up Returns!

The game will be available on Steam, GOG, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation, and Xbox, starting from 26th of September. Get ready to step into the darkness and fight for humanity’s survival!

Have you already tried the Night Slashers: Remake demo on Steam? If not, let's go and give it a try!

⚫https://store.steampowered.com/app/2795750/Night_Slashers_Remake/

Wishlist the game on other platforms:
🔵https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10011325
🟣https://www.gog.com/game/night_slashers_remake
